PW22·3 | Atsushi, the Blazing Sky | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample When Atsushi, the Blazing Sky dies, choose one — • Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. • Create three Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: Flying, trample When Atsushi, the Blazing Sky dies, choose one — • Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. • Create three Treasure tokens.
